definition: in law, a conference held before the trial begins to bring the parties together to outline discovery proceedings and to define the issues to be tried
details:
noun
- in law, a conference held before the trial begins to bring the parties together to outline discovery proceedings and to define the issues to be tried
= example: in law, a conference held before the trial begins to bring the parties together to outline discovery proceedings and to define the issues to be tried
= synonyms: pretrial conference
